comments.body:
How about adding more cases?
invalid case: `interval 10 nanoseconds`
valid case: `interval 1 year 2 month 3 week 4 day 5 hour 6 minute -7 seconds 8 millisecond, 9 microsecond`

@kiszk fair enough :) I've added test cases for intervals in the wrong order, additions / substractions of intervals, repeating date keywords, embedded spaces etc..

let me know!
i wouldn't add this many test cases, since they are just simple aliases. jsut add one for calendarinterval and keep the cast ones.
